description: This sweet potato nacho bake is even better than the real thing, a crowd-pleasing dish perfect for Mexican night.
name: Sweet Potato Nacho Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 700g sweet potatoes, thinly sliced into rounds
2 medium limes, 1 juiced, 1 cut into wedges
80g jalapeno peppers, drained and finely diced
1 medium red onion, peeled and finely sliced into half moons

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Whisk the spices and oil together in a large bowl. Add the sweet potato slices and toss well to coat, working in two batches if necessary. Spread the slices in single layers, divided between 2 large baking trays. Bake for 20 minutes, flip each slice and bake for 15 minutes.
Scatter over the black beans, salsa and the grated cheddar and bake for 15 minutes more. Meanwhile, steep the red onion in the juice of a lime and set aside.
Mash the avocados in a bowl and stir through a squeeze of lime, some chopped coriander and half the jalapenos.
Remove the nachos from the oven, top with avocado, lime pickled onions, jalapenos and chopped coriander and serve.
